channel.title: 2Handed sword problem
channel.description: So yea, i have the godswords two handed but is not working fully , when u equip a weapon wich is 2handed and you have a shield , the shield gets removed right , but u can equip ur shield again and the weapon doesnt get removed and u can have the shield and the weapon together, would any one , help me with this? thank you :)

item.title: 2Handed sword problem
item.dc:creator: @benscape benscape
item.description:
@benscape wrote:

This can be common this some servers, use the search bar to find out, and if your on about the sara or amardyl gs, then you must be using a czar or czar based source.

Read full topic
